sentences.en: "They always rag me about my car," he says.
sentences.cn: “他们总拿我的汽车取笑我，”他说。

sentences.en: "This man Tom works for a local rag," he said.
sentences.cn: “这个叫汤姆的人在一家地方小报社工作，”他说。

sentences.en: an oily rag
sentences.cn: 沾满油污的抹布

sentences.en: He passed his hand over the brown wash - rag of a back.
sentences.cn: 他的手抚摸着狗背上棕色毛巾似的皮毛.

sentences.en: He was wiping his hands on an oily rag.
sentences.cn: 他正在用一块满是油污的破布擦手。

sentences.en: He wiped his boots dry with an old rag.
sentences.cn: 他用一块旧布把他的靴子擦干。

sentences.en: I don't like the local rag.
sentences.cn: 我不喜欢本地报纸.

sentences.en: I've only once seen him lose his rag.
sentences.cn: 我只见他发过一次脾气。

sentences.en: It looked like a piece of rag.
sentences.cn: 它看上去像块破布。

sentences.en: it was the old rags-to-riches fantasy.
sentences.cn: 那是一夜成巨富的古老幻想。

sentences.en: It's just an old rag I had in the closet.
sentences.cn: 这只不过是我挂在壁橱里的旧衣服罢了.

sentences.en: The hallway smelt of boiled cabbage and old rag mats.
sentences.cn: 门厅里一股子清煮白菜外带破草垫的味儿.

sentences.en: The multicoloured rag rug was chosen to liven up the grey carpet.
sentences.cn: 选择这块五彩缤纷的碎呢小毯是为了给这灰色的地毯添些生气。

sentences.en: The rag trade is extremely competitive, and one needs plenty of contacts in order to survive.
sentences.cn: 成衣业的竞争极为激烈，其从业者要想站住脚，就要有许多关系。

sentences.en: The simplest rag-rugs are made with strips of fabric plaited together.
sentences.cn: 最简单的碎布地毯是由碎布条编在一起制成的。

sentences.en: There is not a rag left.
sentences.cn: 分文也没剩下.

sentences.en: There were men, women, and small children, some dressed in rags.
sentences.cn: 有男人、女人和孩子，其中一些人穿着破烂的衣服。

sentences.en: This sort of information is like a red rag to a bull for the tobacco companies.
sentences.cn: 烟草公司知道了这种消息一定会大怒。

sentences.en: Use a rag soaked in linseed oil.
sentences.cn: 使用浸过亚麻籽油的抹布.

sentences.en: We started out with a little rag-tag team of 30 people.
sentences.cn: 我们最初只是一支由30人组成的散兵游勇的队伍。
